column1: Little Goat Diner////We went here for brunch on a weekday. The wait was only about 20 minutes
column2: and the service was great- not too pushy
column3: not too hard to find. We shared the turkey sandwich and a cinnamon roll. I highly recommend both of these. I'm usually not a fan of cinnamon rolls in general
column4: but I would go back just to eat one here! I'm looking forward to going back for breakfast
